entities.name: black
entities.description: The noble and most ancient house of Black is mentioned as the subject of the conversation. The text describes it as having a long history and a tradition of beheading house-elves.

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus is described as the least popular headmaster Hogwarts ever had. He is mentioned as being related to Sirius Black.

entities.name: araminta meliflua
entities.description: Araminta Meliflua is described as a cousin of Sirius's mother and tried to force through a Ministry Bill to make Muggle-hunting legal.

entities.name: elladora
entities.description: Elladora is described as Sirius's aunt who started the family tradition of beheading house-elves when they got too old to carry tea trays.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as being related to Harry and Sirius. Her mother, Andromeda, was a favorite cousin of Sirius's.

entities.name: andromeda
entities.description: Andromeda is described as the mother of Tonks and a favorite cousin of Sirius's.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as being related to the Black family and not taking orders from Tonks because she is not in the family.

relationships.description: Phineas Nigellus is described as Sirius's great-great-grandfather.
Araminta Meliflua is described as a cousin of Sirius's mother.
Elladora is described as Sirius's aunt.
Andromeda is described as the mother of Tonks.
Tonks is mentioned as being related to Harry and Sirius. Her mother, Andromeda, was a favorite cousin of Sirius's.
Kreacher is mentioned as being related to the Black family and not taking orders from Tonks because she is not in the family.
